main.header: Hello stranger and welcome to my place.
main.selfDescription: My name is Alexei, I'm a senior full-stack web developer and simply a nice guy. I like coding as much as shredding my guitar out. I provide clean code and excellent at developing and maintaining client/server applications with any modern DB support.
